org.apache.jmeter.protocol.tcp.sampler

接口 TCPClient

  • 所有已知实现类:
    AbstractTCPClient, BinaryTCPClientImpl, LengthPrefixedBinaryTCPClientImpl, TCPClientDecorator, TCPClientImpl

    public interface TCPClient
    Interface required by TCPSampler for TCPClient implementations.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      java.lang.String getCharset()
      Get the charset.
      byte getEolByte()
      Get the end-of-line/end-of-message byte.
      java.lang.String read(java.io.InputStream is)
      已过时。 
      since 3.3, implement read(InputStream, SampleResult) instead, will be removed in future version
      java.lang.String read(java.io.InputStream is, SampleResult sampleResult) 
      void setEolByte(int eolInt)
      Set the end-of-line/end-of-message byte.
      void setupTest()
      Invoked when the thread starts.
      void teardownTest()
      Invoked when the thread ends
      void write(java.io.OutputStream os, java.io.InputStream is)

    • 方法详细资料

      • setupTest

        void setupTest()
        Invoked when the thread starts.

      • teardownTest

        void teardownTest()
        Invoked when the thread ends

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream os,
           java.io.InputStream is)
    throws java.io.IOException
        参数:
        os - - OutputStream for socket
        is - - InputStream to be written to Socket
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - when writing fails

      • write

        void write(java.io.OutputStream os,
           java.lang.String s)
    throws java.io.IOException
        参数:
        os - - OutputStream for socket
        s - - String to write
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - when writing fails

      • read

        @Deprecated
java.lang.String read(java.io.InputStream is)
                           throws ReadException
        已过时。 since 3.3, implement read(InputStream, SampleResult) instead, will be removed in future version
        参数:
        is - - InputStream for socket
        返回:
        String read from socket
        抛出:
        ReadException - exception that can contain partial response (Response until error occurred)

      • read

        java.lang.String read(java.io.InputStream is,
                      SampleResult sampleResult)
               throws ReadException
        参数:
        is - - InputStream for socket
        sampleResult - SampleResult
        返回:
        String read from socket
        抛出:
        ReadException - exception that can contain partial response

      • getEolByte

        byte getEolByte()
        Get the end-of-line/end-of-message byte.
        返回:
        Returns the eolByte.

      • getCharset

        java.lang.String getCharset()
        Get the charset.
        返回:
        Returns the charset.

      • setEolByte

        void setEolByte(int eolInt)
        Set the end-of-line/end-of-message byte. If the value is out of range of a byte, then it is to be ignored.
        参数:
        eolInt - The value to set
